title: Process Fan Ticket Resale
description: A season ticket holder cannot attend a game and wants to sell their tickets on the team's official resale marketplace.

tasks.description: Identify the fan and the specific tickets they wish to sell.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the fan's tickets for the upcoming game.

tasks.description: Guide the fan to list their tickets on the resale marketplace, helping them set a price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assists the fan in creating the ticket listing.

tasks.description: Once sold, transfer the ticket barcode to the new buyer and process the payout to the original ticket holder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully facilitates the transfer and payment.
